cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 1 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

cancellationPolicies.label: Non-refundable rates
cancellationPolicies.description: Your booking is non-refundable. If you choose to cancel your booking, or in the case of a no-show, you will still be charged the full cost of your booking.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
Retro caravans blend vintage charm and modern comfort. Ideal for couples. A unique and cozy experience.
Fridge, Microwave, Table & Chairs, Split system reverse cycle heating & cooling, Kitchen equipment, Linen and towels, No TV.

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or don’t show up.

privates.name: Basic 4 Bed Family Room Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Older style, un-renovated cabins. These are all a little bit tatty. Standard single bunk beds. Brand new queen mattress, new linen and towels, but all other furnishings are older.

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or don’t show up.

privates.name: Superior 6 Bed Family Room Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Brand new Scandi-style cabin featuring timber finishes, large glass windows, and high-quality fixtures. Contemporary kitchen, washing machine, a spacious outdoor deck. New premium mattresses, linen, and towels. Plus private washing machine and dryer.

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or don’t show up.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 1st Nov 2025 (AEDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 1st Nov 2025 (AEDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
